document.title: Books Received in The Jewish Studies Library, August-October, 1999
document.snippet: Description: 100 ha-yamim ha-rishonim : hamlatsot le-reformot mivniyot ba-rashut ha-mehokeket, ba-sherut ha-tsiburi uva-shilton ha-mekomi / tsevet ha-makhon ha-Yisreeli le-demokratyah, be-rashut David Nahmias ; be-hishtatfut Yaron Ezrahi
